location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Colonel John Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a register of drafts sent by Lieutenant-Colonel Macdonald for forthcoming bills that he would be sending to the treasury at Bushire, and regarding the rate of exchange between Tomans and Rupees at that time.The letter also refers to the following enclosures which are no longer present:Statement of expenses incurred by the Tehran mission in the previous financial quarter;Account showing the cash remaining on deposit at the Bushire treasury.
